seo.title: AnividAI Product Changelog & Release Notes
seo.description: Track AnividAI releases, new features, improvements, and bug fixes across anime image generation, OC tools, video workflows, and community updates.

title: Product Changelog
description: Track all version updates, new features, improvements, and bug fixes for AnividAI.

contentGuide.heading: How to read our release notes
items: Each version groups product updates by change type so you can quickly identify new capabilities.
Use recent entries to track updates to Anime Generator, Video Generator, and OC workflows.
Check fixed items to verify whether previously reported issues have been addressed.
Follow this page regularly to monitor platform stability and feature rollout progress.
